title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 348.9 - Hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 348.9 - Hearings

State Regulations

Any establishment demanding a hearing shall be entitled to
be heard with respect to any elements of liability including factual issues
relating to: (a) violations found upon
the inspection and the reinspection; (b) violations found upon the compliance
inspection or inspections; (c) calculation of any charges made to the establishment pursuant to section
38-a
of the Agriculture and Markets Law and
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
348.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
